column4: I got a thinkpad laptop and ive install hoary on it. anyone have a clue how i get suspend to work?
lol suspend even on windows is a bit iffy with thinkpads... need to have acpi and apm going
works fine in windows... it sucks when you a very mobile with your laptop and dont have access to power... i have to reboot all the time now, whereas with windows i can just suspend it
if anyone else ever askes: http://ibm-acpi.sourceforge.net/
